DOC.brief_summary: This study design evaluate efficacy safety major depressive disorder patient .
DOC.brief_title: Study Of 323U66 SR In Major Depressive Disorder
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Met DSMIVTR criterion major depressive disorder current episode least 8 week prior screen visit . Must give write informed consent . But patient 20 , patient himself/herself his/her proxy consenter must give write informed consent . Must rating score outline . Exclusion criterion : Current past history seizure disorder brain injury . Current past history anorexia bulimia nervosa . History manic episode . Past current DSM IVTR diagnosis schizophrenia psychotic disorder . Diagnosis substance abuse ( alcohol drug ) DSMIVTR criterion . Pregnant , possibly pregnant lactating . Must suicidal . Blood pressure SBP > 160mmHg , DBP > 100mmHg . History complication cancer malignant tumour .
